using sprite is ok but the size of big sprite is terrible because you will have to embed all your icons in png file ... using fonts for icons is much better because if you change your icons size you will have to change your sprite and your css correct? in fonts all what you have to do is to update your font file and that's it :) also you don't have to make a special font you can google icons font generator.
